name: phoenix-vscode-command-center
description: Board and Actions command center for Phoenix workflows.

phoenixOps.projectOwner.description: Project owner login for GitHub Projects v2 queries.

phoenixOps.projectNumber.description: Project number for the shared board.

phoenixOps.supervisorBaseUrl.description: Local supervisor service base URL for snapshot and SSE endpoints.

phoenixOps.supervisorAuthToken.description: Optional bearer token for authenticated supervisor deployments.

phoenixOps.workspaceSupervisorAutoStart.description: Automatically start the Workspace Supervisor repo server when supervisorBaseUrl points to localhost and the server is down.

phoenixOps.workspaceSupervisorRepoPath.description: Optional absolute or workspace-relative path to Phoenix-Agentic-Workspace-Supervisor. Leave empty for auto-discovery.

phoenixOps.workspaceSupervisorStartTimeo.description: How long to wait for workspace supervisor startup health checks.

phoenixOps.embeddedSupervisorEnabled.description: Run the bundled embedded supervisor sidecar. Keep disabled to use the Workspace Supervisor repo as primary control plane.

phoenixOps.embeddedSupervisorHost.description: Host interface for the bundled embedded supervisor.

phoenixOps.embeddedSupervisorPort.description: Port for the bundled embedded supervisor sidecar.

phoenixOps.embeddedSupervisorApiToken.description: Optional bearer token used between extension and embedded supervisor.

phoenixOps.useSupervisorStream.description: Use the supervisor SSE stream when available.

phoenixOps.allowDirectGhPollingFallback.description: Allow direct gh polling when supervisor stream/snapshot is unavailable. Keep disabled to route reads through supervisor only.

phoenixOps.refreshSeconds.description: Polling interval used for fallback refreshes.

phoenixOps.boardCacheSeconds.description: Board cache lifetime in seconds. Higher values reduce GitHub API usage.

phoenixOps.actionsCacheSeconds.description: Actions cache lifetime in seconds. Higher values reduce GitHub API usage.

phoenixOps.pullRequestCacheSeconds.description: Pull request cache lifetime in seconds. Higher values reduce GitHub API usage.

phoenixOps.rateLimitCooldownSeconds.description: Cooldown duration after GitHub rate-limit detection before retrying live GH calls.

phoenixOps.repositories.description: Optional explicit repository slugs (owner/name). If empty, repositories are discovered by mode.

phoenixOps.repositoryDiscoveryMode.description: Repository auto-discovery mode when phoenixOps.repositories is empty.

phoenixOps.codexCliAuthCommand.description: Terminal command used by 'Phoenix Ops: Sign In to Codex CLI'. Set to 'auto' to prefer `codex login` with fallback.

phoenixOps.copilotCliAuthCommand.description: Terminal command used by 'Phoenix Ops: Sign In to Copilot CLI'. Set to 'auto' to prefer `copilot login` with fallback.

phoenixOps.codexModelOptions.description: Fallback Codex model IDs for composer model selection when no model hub is configured/reachable.

phoenixOps.copilotModelOptions.description: Fallback Copilot model IDs for composer model selection when no model hub is configured/reachable.

phoenixOps.agentModelCatalogUrl.description: Optional HTTP(S) endpoint for live composer model catalogs. Supports payloads shaped like {services:{codex:[...],copilot:[...]}}.

phoenixOps.agentModelCatalogAuthToken.description: Optional bearer token used when requesting phoenixOps.agentModelCatalogUrl.

phoenixOps.mcpToolOptions.description: MCP tool IDs exposed in the composer selector. Extension also adds configured MCP server names as server:<name>.

phoenixOps.jarvisEnabled.description: Enable Jarvis voice assistant features in Command Center.

phoenixOps.jarvisAutoAnnouncements.description: Allow scheduled Jarvis automatic callouts based on supervisor state.

phoenixOps.jarvisApiBaseUrl.description: Optional Pollinations OpenAI-compatible base URL for Jarvis. Leave empty to auto-select based on API key.

phoenixOps.jarvisApiKey.description: Pollinations API key used for Jarvis text and voice generation.

phoenixOps.jarvisTextModel.description: Optional model name for Jarvis text completions. Leave empty to auto-select based on API key.

phoenixOps.jarvisSpeechModel.description: Optional OpenAI speech model for Jarvis synthesis. Leave empty to auto-select based on API key.

phoenixOps.jarvisVoice.description: Voice ID passed to Pollinations speech API.

phoenixOps.jarvisMaxAnnouncementsPerHour.description: Maximum automatic Jarvis callouts per rolling hour.

phoenixOps.jarvisMinSecondsBetweenAnnoun.description: Minimum seconds between automatic Jarvis callouts.

phoenixOps.jarvisReasonCooldownMinutes.description: Cooldown per auto-callout reason before Jarvis repeats the same type.

phoenixOps.jarvisHostPlaybackSpacingMs.description: Milliseconds of silence inserted between queued Jarvis host-audio playback items.

phoenixOps.jarvisOfferJokes.description: Allow occasional joke offers when the workspace looks healthy.

phoenixOps.jarvisConversationHistoryTurn.description: Conversation turns retained for Jarvis context.

scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile
